Title: Freeza Bares His Fangs! Transcendent Power Attacks Gohan
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Plot: Vegeta is impressed by Gohan's furious outburst after Frieza strikes a death blow against Krillin. The two Saiyans work together to defeat the monster, but even their combined powers won't be enough spare their lives!
